DefaultMessage: Hi, how may I assist you? You can choose one of the options listed below.
ErrorMessage: Oops! Looks like something went wrong with me. Just like humans get ill, I also sometimes get ill. Pray that I get well soon.
NoInternetMessage: I am more intelligent when you are connected to the internet.
URLCannotLaunch: Sorry. I couldn't launch the URL. But you can copy and paste it.
StateNotAvailable: Sorry. We do not have data for this state right now
DistrictNotAvailable: Sorry. We do not have data for this district right now
Name: Name
